title: Dead Island 2 breaks 2 million sales, is now 'the biggest launch' in Deep Silver's history
description: Embracer said today that Dead Island 2 has "far surpassed' expectations.

title: OK, I'll play this open world settlement builder that's got sky whales, ridable mice, and Link's glider
description: Towers of Aghasba has one of the more interesting open worlds I've seen in a while, and lots of ways to explore it.

title: Cayde-6 returns in Destiny 2: The Final Shape, Nathan Fillion reprising role
description: Bungie teased the Light & Darkness Saga conclusion at the PlayStation show today.

title: PlayStation drops a huge 11 minute Spider-Man 2 gameplay reveal
description: Peter dons the Venom suit in our first look at Spider-Man 2 gameplay that we'll have on PC... eventually.

title: Bungie is bringing Marathon back as an extraction shooter
description: The revival of Bungie's first big shooter was unveiled at today's PlayStation Showcase.

title: First Dragon's Dogma 2 gameplay sure looks like Dragon's Dogma
description: At long last.

title: Alan Wake 2 is out in October, adds a new protagonist: Saga Anderson
description: Remedy writer Sam Lake makes an appearance, too.

title: The next gorgeous adventure from Gris' developers is going to make me cry again
description: Nomada Studio has just announced Neva, a puzzle platformer about a woman and a wolf cub.

title: Assassin's Creed Mirage gameplay trailer delivers pole vaulting, finger-blades, and an October release date
description: See Ubisoft's next assassin in action.

title: The Talos Principle 2 is coming this year
description: The long-awaited sequel to Croteam's hit puzzle game made a surprise appearance at today's PlayStation Showcase.

title: The Metal Gear Solid 3 remake is real
description: Snaaaaaaake Eater.

title: Finally, a sequel to one of my favorite co-op shooters: Helldivers 2 is coming to PC and PS5 simultaneously
description: The Magicka dev's excellent 2015 co-op shooter is getting a grand sequel.

title: Become a hotel tycoon in Cities: Skylines' final expansion
description: The Hotels & Retreats expansion, out today, lets you build and manage a hotel chain.

title: Stunned Embracer CEO has to deliver financial report right after $2 billion mystery deal falls apart: 'It's been a rough night'
description: The 'transformative' partnership was supposed to be announced today, but was unexpectedly halted last night.

title: Move over, modern technology: Here's Doom running on the teletext TV information service
description: You can even control it with the remote.

title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake is starting over from scratch
description: The remake, which was announced in 2020, is now in the "conception" phase.

title: We need to talk about all the fans, hard drives and boxes we're hoarding
description: "It's not hoarding if you might need them."

title: Prison Architect's final update gives the first glimpse of a 3D sequel
description: The game came out in 2012.

title: The RTX 4060 Ti shows the hard limits of Nvidia's Frame Generation technology
description: My testing highlights the fact that instead of giving extra performance, sometimes Frame Generation can slow your games down.

title: Nvidia's RTX 4060 Ti and AMD's RX 7600 highlight one thing: Intel's $200 Arc A750 GPU is the best budget GPU by far
description: It's a genuinely great deal for the money and a decent budget gaming card.

title: Destiny 2 Deep Dive secrets and how it works
description: Every hidden triumph so far in the new seasonal activity.

title: Former DC Universe Online chief is heading up the creation of a brand-new Warhammer MMO
description: Jack Emmert's Netease-backed studio has a new name and a new game.

title: How to craft Blood Merlot in V Rising
description: Sipping on the good stuff.

title: Fallout was nearly called 'Warriors of the Apocalypse', 'Radstorm', 'Moribund World' and so many other terrible names
description: "It was a bad name. I said we really need to come up with something better."

title: This Diablo IV-themed PC gear reminded me how much companies love slapping a fan tax onto existing products
description: Nostalgia is a powerful weapon for companies clearing out old stock.

title: How to fish in Destiny 2's Season of the Deep
description: What kind of fish lives in a lake filled with Vex milk? I'm not sure I want to know.

title: Left 4 Dead creator says they got it right in the end because 'Gabe dragged it out of me'
description: "[The game] was college rock bands and getting too drunk so that you’d puke off the side, and it's the greatest time anyone ever had. And I was scared to say that."

title: AMD Radeon RX 7600
description: AMD's RX 7600 does just enough to shake up the entry level gaming GPU market.

title: How to get Pollen in V Rising
description: They just can't keep it in their plants.

title: Witcher showrunner says they had the choice to end the show after Cavill's departure, but there were 'too many stories left to tell'
description: Lauren Hissrich sat down and talked witchin' in a recent chat with Total Film.

title: Bill Gates reckons AI spells the end for Amazon and searching for stuff on Google
description: "You’ll never go to Amazon again."

title: Microsoft's upcoming desktop AI is a pop-up away from becoming an even more annoying Clippy
description: Widnows Copilot looks fine now, but god forbid it starts bugging me on the desktop with 'helpful' popups.

title: As someone who grew up playing DOOM and Quake, Warhammer 40K: Boltgun is like returning home
description: Warhammer 40K: Boltgun is the ultraviolet, gore-drenched retro boomer shooter upgrade of my dreams

title: Apple owning microLED monitor manufacturing has us worried
description: Apple holding a load of microLED patents probably won't be a good thing.

title: How to get Epochal Integration in Destiny 2
description: Complete the Parting the Veil quest to collect this curated legendary hand cannon.

title: Activision Blizzard fined 0.00007% of one year's earnings for not disclosing loot boxes to Europe's game ratings board
